SummaryEnglish: Craig and his friends, Kelsey and JP, venture out into a kid-controlled wilderness in the creek.

1.SummaryEnglish: Craig drops his staff into the sewers after getting distracted by his older brother, Bernard, and his girlfriend, Alexis. He teams up with his best friends Kelsey and J.P. and venture to the Creek to look for it, encountering other strange and wild kids along the way.

2.SummaryEnglish: When Bernard dents the family car, Craig takes advantage to get Bernard to do his bidding.

3.SummaryEnglish: Craig talks about his exciting day while eating dinner with his family.

4.TitleEnglish: The Williams Family Opening Theme Song
4.SummaryEnglish: Craig imagines the opening theme song to a TV show based on his family.

5.SummaryEnglish: Craig gives a how to on mapping the Creek, but he must also rescue J.P. and Mortimer from a "raging" river.

6.SummaryEnglish: In a parody of the "Pokérap", Craig tries to name all of the Creek Kids to Jessica, but quickly gets tired.

7.SummaryEnglish: Ever wonder how an episode is made? Go behind the scenes of Craig of the Creek with Philip Solomon (voice of Craig) and the rest of the creek crew!

8.SummaryEnglish: Get to know voices behind Craig, Kelsey and JP from Craig of the Creek!

9.SummaryEnglish: Happy 50th Earth Day! Craig, JP, Kelsey and Mortimer want to show you how you can make a difference in your own environment by reducing, reusing and recycling.

10.SummaryEnglish: Follow the adventures of Craig, Kelsey and JP as they explore the untamed wilderness of the Creek, a kitten utopia in their own backyards. Craig leads his besties on imaginative missions to map every corner of this inspired world full of unoccupied cardboard boxes, scratching posts, mouse hunting, and resident Creek kittens.

11.SummaryEnglish: Stop Bullying: Speak Up is Cartoon Network's award-winning, multi-platform pro-social initiative that addresses bullying among kids - what to do when you see it and how to stop it before it starts.

1.SummaryEnglish: Discovering that there's an unmapped part of the Creek in the center of the Posion Ivy Grove, Craig and his friends set out to discover what waits for them there and become legends among their peers, only to realize something is stalking them through the ivy.

2.SummaryEnglish: An enjoyable day at the soda-bottle races is ruined when a game of tag that has been terrorizing the Creek-Kids for longer than anyone can remember makes Kelsey its latest victim.

3.SummaryEnglish: When Craig and Jessica are locked out of the house, Craig has no choice but to bring his little sister to the Creek.

4.SummaryEnglish: The last book of Kelsey's favorite fantasy series goes missing from the library, so Craig decides to help her solve the mystery of who took it.

5.SummaryEnglish: Hoping to fix their fort, Craig enlists the 10 Speeds to give them a ride to the legendary Junk Pile.

6.SummaryEnglish: An encounter with Wildernessa, guardian of the wilderness, inspires Kelsey to take up a cause.

7.SummaryEnglish: JP dirties his last clean clothes and he must wear his Sunday best to the creek.

8.SummaryEnglish: There's a huge water balloon fight at the creek but Craig is stuck at home for a family dinner, unless he can escape.

9.SummaryEnglish: Craig is determined to catch the monster that has been wreaking havoc in Granddad's garden.

10.SummaryEnglish: Craig, Kelsey and JP run afoul of some no-good teenage witches and are cursed! Lousy teenagers!

11.SummaryEnglish: Unable to make tough decisions, Craig decides to put his choices in the hands of a dog named Fred.

12.SummaryEnglish: Craig wants to play a popular card game, so he decides to borrow Bernard's vintage and valuable cards.

13.SummaryEnglish: Craig agrees to help The Sewer Queen map the sewers, but he quickly finds himself in over his head.

14.SummaryEnglish: The kids meet an eccentric Cardboard Creator that invites Craig to help finish his masterpiece.

15.SummaryEnglish: Craig's determination to get his granddad a cicada shell causes him, Kelsey and JP to become trapped in their stump!

16.SummaryEnglish: Craig and his friends travel to find honeysuckle in the creek but discover a whole new part of the creek.

17.SummaryEnglish: Craig and his friends are invited to an exclusive tea party with delicious desserts, if they can last to the end of the party…

18.SummaryEnglish: Craig and his friends start a band, but Craig is haunted by a frightening nightmare.

19.SummaryEnglish: Kelsey accepts a quest from the Elders of the Creek, but is she ready for her terrifying opponent?

20.SummaryEnglish: JP decides to follow his heart and tries to join the Horse Girls.

21.SummaryEnglish: Craig vows to make the game of Four Square fun again by challenging its most dominant player!

22.SummaryEnglish: Craig makes a long distance connection with a kid that loves the creek as much as he does.

23.TitleEnglish: The Last Kid in the Creek
23.SummaryEnglish: A terrible curse leaves Craig as the only kid in the creek.

24.SummaryEnglish: Craig's phone gets stuck in Mt. Sycamore, the tallest tree in the creek!

25.SummaryEnglish: JP leads his friends on a voyage to find the biggest crayfish in the creek.

26.SummaryEnglish: The gang meets a mysterious kid from the future and tries to help him complete his mission.

27.SummaryEnglish: Fed up with losing in video games to his father, Craig seeks training in the Creek.

28.SummaryEnglish: A high-speed race with a high-stakes prize may be too much for Craig and his friends.

29.SummaryEnglish: Kelsey starts a super-secret book club to introduce Craig and JP to the joys of reading.

30.SummaryEnglish: JP believes he may be from another planet, so Craig tries to help him make contact.

31.SummaryEnglish: Kelsey leads her friends on the most important quest ever, picking up takeout for dinner.

32.SummaryEnglish: Bernard is left in charge for the evening, so Craig sets out to find his own dinner at the creek.

33.SummaryEnglish: Jessica wanders into an unfamiliar creek, leaving Craig to find her before his Mom notices!

34.SummaryEnglish: Craig and his friends discover a large quantity of bugs and decide to care for them by creating a Bug City. Craig suddenly begins becoming possessive of them due to outside elements, such as Mortimer, terrorizing them and decides to take extra precaution by "protecting" them.

35.SummaryEnglish: The Trio finds gold in the muddy depths of the Creek so Craig builds a rig to recover it.

36.SummaryEnglish: An unusually hot day at the Creek melts all of Kit's ice pops, so Craig helps her find a short cut to her frozen snack supplier before everyone else melts.

37.SummaryEnglish: When a kid claims dibs on the Stump, Craig has no choice but to take them to court. Dibs Court.

38.SummaryEnglish: JP finds a fossil in the Creek which quickly causes the landscape to change.

39.SummaryEnglish: When the Time Keeper goes missing, Craig and his friends take up the task of helping kids get home in time for dinner.

40.SummaryEnglish: Craig has an “emergency” leaving Kelsey alone at the Stump.

1.SummaryEnglish: When a pillar of the Creek community leaves, our trio mourns their loss by remembering the good times.

2.SummaryEnglish: A terrible haircut forces Craig to go undercover at the Creek.

3.SummaryEnglish: Craig discovers that the Honeysuckle Rangers have snuck into his side of the Creek to steal his most prized possession.

4.SummaryEnglish: A spat between the Elders of the Creek leaves an opening in their tabletop role playing game, so Kelsey joins the campaign!

5.SummaryEnglish: Craig goes on a mind-bending journey as he tries to eat the most sour candy in the Creek!

6.SummaryEnglish: When Craig can't go to the Creek, he and his mom decide to build the world's biggest blanket fort.

7.SummaryEnglish: Craig, Kelsey and JP must journey past the Overpass into uncharted territory: the Other Side of the Creek. [episodes 7 & 8]

8.SummaryEnglish: When Craig decides to keep a lightning bug in a jar, he disrupts the delicate balance of Summer.

9.SummaryEnglish: Craig dines at the restaurant where his older brother works and orders up a plate of REVENGE... and lots of breadsticks.

10.SummaryEnglish: Craig and Stacks help Kelsey become a real author turning her story into a book!

11.SummaryEnglish: The circle game wreaks havoc on the Creek, so Craig forms a council to restore order.

12.SummaryEnglish: Craig, Kelsey and JP team up with an intergalactic hero named Sparkle Cadet, hoping to save the Creek from negativity.

13.SummaryEnglish: Craig takes his cousin, Bryson, to the Creek and accidentally starts a water balloon war.

14.SummaryEnglish: A runaway from a summer camp ends up at the Stump, but Craig suspects her story may not be what it seems.

15.SummaryEnglish: An accidental stink bomb explosion causes the kids to evacuate the Creek, but Craig takes it upon himself to rescue those left behind in the stench.

16.SummaryEnglish: Craig rescues a tadpole and decides to raise him into a level 100 frog!

17.SummaryEnglish: Craig and his friends find themselves being followed by a creepy doll and its haunted dollhouse.

18.SummaryEnglish: It's a Williams Family Thanksgiving, which means it's time to reunite The Kid's Table! But when Bernard accidentally destroys dessert, Craig uses the power of the Kids Table to help save his brother from certain grounding. [episode 19 & 20]

19.SummaryEnglish: Jessica comes with Craig to hang out at the Creek. When she refuses to go grass sledding with him and his friends, he takes her to the Creek Daycare. The daycare's owner, Angel, steps out to help a child, leaving Jessica and the Stump Kids to look after the tiny tots. While Craig is having a hard time sitting them, Jessica gives him a lesson.

20.SummaryEnglish: Craig, Kelsey and JP become smugglers to sneak candy to kids in need.

21.SummaryEnglish: JP invites his friends over for a sleepover, but it happens to be on the night of a huge game of Flashlight Tag in the creek.

22.SummaryEnglish: The Tea Timers throw a dance and invite everyone in the creek. Craig believes it's solely to prank him, while Kelsey deals with an unwanted admirer.

23.SummaryEnglish: Craig and his friends stumble upon a mysterious bunker made of cardboard beneath the Creek.

24.SummaryEnglish: Craig, Kelsey and JP discover an ancient fort that belonged to the first kids in the Creek.

25.SummaryEnglish: When Craig, Kelsey and JP get stranded in murkey water, it's up to Mortimor to save the day!

26.SummaryEnglish: Craig needs to get a secret off his chest, so he pays a visit to the Keeper of Secrets in the Creek.

27.SummaryEnglish: After Craig accidentally destroys a shipment of rare Chocorolls at the Trading Tree, Kit makes him work off his debt by running her trades throughout the Creek!

28.SummaryEnglish: Tragedy strikes the Creek when the Elders get trapped under Elder Rock, and it's up to Craig, Kelsey and JP to rescue them.

29.SummaryEnglish: When Kelsey demolishes a wall at Craig's house, her father takes away her sword. So she enlists Craig and J.P. to help prove to her father that she's still worthy.

30.SummaryEnglish: Craig tries to figure out how an ancient war that decimated the Creek began in hopes of stopping history from repeating itself.

31.TitleEnglish: In the Key of the Creek
31.SummaryEnglish: When a rainy day keeps Craig inside, he uses his toys and imagination to create his own Creek adventure in Craig of the Creek's first musical episode!

32.SummaryEnglish: Craig has tried to convince his family to get a dog for years but has never been successful, but he may have a chance if he follows the guidance of a charismatic creek kid and her three step program.

33.SummaryEnglish: Spend some time with Craig's little sister, Jessica, with a series of 5 short stories. Follow along as she trains to be the best video game fighter in "Power Punchers," deals with a loose tooth in "Incisor Trading," puts on her own TV show in "The Jessica & Small Uncle Show," saves Kelsey's sword in "Jessica in Operation" and takes family game night too far in "Jessica in Payup!"

34.SummaryEnglish: The kids are on the search for an elusive ferret in the Creek. Kelsey unites her friends Stacks and Wildernessa to find it, but worries they'd rather hangout with each other instead of her.

35.SummaryEnglish: Craig and The Green Poncho travel to the Other Side of the Creek where Craig learns Green Poncho's shocking origin story.

36.SummaryEnglish: Worried he'll one day forget all his favorite memories, Craig creates a time capsule to remember them all.

37.SummaryEnglish: Resident creek scientist, Wren, enlists Craig to voyage through dangerous waters in search of a path to the Ocean.

38.SummaryEnglish: Craig, Kelsey and JP help a kid who's been jinxed and can't talk, but they soon come to regret it.

1.SummaryEnglish: Hoping to win a special prize for his Dad's birthday, Craig and his friends compete in a tournament on the Other Side of the Creek. [episode 1 & 2]

2.SummaryEnglish: When an intense game of The Ground is Lava breaks out, Craig must carefully traverse the Creek to save his sister.

3.TitleEnglish: Council of the Creek: Operation Hive-Mind
3.SummaryEnglish: When bees take over the Trading Tree, Craig must assemble the Council of the Creek to avert disaster.

4.SummaryEnglish: Craig investigates the theft of the 10 Speed's bikes in hopes of finding the culprit.

5.SummaryEnglish: Craig hits the beach with his friends and family but starts to worry his father is more fun than him.

6.SummaryEnglish: Craig, Kelsey, JP and Jessica discover a group of plushie obsessed kids, deep within the creek.

7.SummaryEnglish: Craig sets out in search of Ice Pops on a hot day with the help of an unlikely duo.

8.SummaryEnglish: When Pencil Break Mania hits the Creek, JP finds himself as an unlikely champion and is forced to defend his title against the very best!

9.SummaryEnglish: It's the last day of summer, and the last chance for Craig to uncover an ancient treasure beneath the Creek.

10.SummaryEnglish: It's Halloween at the Creek, and Craig is on a mission to collect as much candy as humanly possible, but a spooky ghoul from the Creek's past threatens his haul. [episode 11 & 12]

11.SummaryEnglish: In an attempt to finish a school project, Craig remembers some of his favorite Fall moments.

12.SummaryEnglish: Craig enters a food competition in the Creek, but worries he may be out of his league.

13.SummaryEnglish: Craig finds himself being chased by a monster in the Creek that's straight out of the movies!

14.SummaryEnglish: The Williams family goes camping and Craig helps his dad prove he's the King of Camping.

15.TitleEnglish: The Rise and Fall of the Green Poncho
15.SummaryEnglish: In this sequel to "Into the Overpast", Craig tries to warn his friends about the other side of the creek with a tale from the creek's defender - the Green Poncho.

16.SummaryEnglish: Craig decides to ditch his hat on a chilly day, and it becomes a battle for body heat.

17.SummaryEnglish: Craig, Kelsey and JP imagine a disturbing alternate reality where they never became friends.

18.SummaryEnglish: Craig and his friends desperately want a snow day, so they turn to the most powerful people they know - the Witches of the Creek.

19.SummaryEnglish: Craig returns to the Creek after the long Winter Break only to find an empty wasteland and danger lurking in the snow. [episode 21 & 22]

20.SummaryEnglish: Craig and his friends decide to take refuge from the chilly creek at his house until lunchtime.

21.SummaryEnglish: While searching a once unreachable part of the Creek, Craig gets stranded with his longtime rival, Wildernessa!

22.SummaryEnglish: Craig, Kelsey and JP try their luck at winning Gold in their first ever Winter Creeklympics, which is a big event for the area.

23.SummaryEnglish: Craig and his friends create their own neighborhood in the Snow!

24.SummaryEnglish: When Elder Con comes to the Creek, Craig, Kelsey and JP each have a con experience they'll never forget.

25.SummaryEnglish: After donning a brand new Jersey, JP is recruited by the Hockey Kids! The only way to get JP back is for Craig and Kelsey to hit the ice!

26.SummaryEnglish: Our Trio makes a new friend in the Creek, but when her pet befalls a tragic fate, Kelsey believes she knows how to help.

27.SummaryEnglish: Craig creates an amusement park in the Creek! But when things start to get stale, he vows to make it bigger and better, no matter what it takes!

28.SummaryEnglish: Fed up with their home experiences, Craig, Kelsey and J.P. agree to switch bodies.

29.SummaryEnglish: Craig and his friends stumble upon Carter, the cardboard genius turned cyborg, and Craig decides to help Carter become a kid again, just like him!

30.SummaryEnglish: As Craig races against time to build a super important invention, we learn how Craig became such a clever inventor!

31.SummaryEnglish: Entranced with the Trading Tree and Kit's business acumen, Jessica joins Kit as her intern.

32.TitleEnglish: Capture the Flag Part 1: The Candy
32.SummaryEnglish: When mysterious circumstances cause issues at the Trading Tree, Craig tries to save the day!

33.TitleEnglish: Capture the Flag Part 2: The King
33.SummaryEnglish: The Creek gets help from an unlikely friend.

34.TitleEnglish: Capture the Flag Part 3: The Legend
34.SummaryEnglish: Craig goes in search of answers, and finds a legend.

35.TitleEnglish: Capture the Flag Part 4: The Plan
35.SummaryEnglish: Craig puts a plan into motion to save the Creek.

36.TitleEnglish: Capture the Flag Part 5: The Game
36.SummaryEnglish: It all comes down to this, the fate of the Creek is at stake! [episode 39 & 40]

1.SummaryEnglish: When the library is thrown into disarray, an ancient ghost is awoken.

2.SummaryEnglish: On the eve of a big holiday party, the Williams kids are locked out of the house, leading to a frantic search all over town for a spare key.

3.SummaryEnglish: The Capture the Flag war is over; Craig returns to the Creek, hoping to get some recognition for his heroic deeds but finds a new quest instead.

4.SummaryEnglish: Craig offers to help the Sewer Queen by going under cover as a member of the swim team.

5.SummaryEnglish: Craig tries to rid himself of a bad nickname.

6.SummaryEnglish: Craig and his friends enter a cooking battle for a piece of the cube.

7.SummaryEnglish: When Craig is having trouble with some math homework, Sparkle Cadet comes to the rescue.

8.SummaryEnglish: The Squashinator challenges Craig to a battle he can't refuse.

9.SummaryEnglish: Craig and his cousin Bryson join forces for an action-packed weekend at their grandparents' house.

10.SummaryEnglish: Kelsey and Stacks write a story for book club, which turns out to be more personal than Kelsey realized.

11.SummaryEnglish: Craig and his friends come upon a mysterious moss village that could aid them in their quest.

12.SummaryEnglish: Craig searches for more clues to aid his quest for the Heart of the Forest.

13.SummaryEnglish: Opposite day turns out to be very different than what everyone thought it would be.

14.SummaryEnglish: Craig goes all in at the Baby Casino.

15.SummaryEnglish: Hoping to help the Creek Daycare, Craig organizes a talent show.

16.SummaryEnglish: Friends and rivals are pitted against each other in a dangerous game of dodgeball.

17.SummaryEnglish: Craig and his friends are challenged to find the greatest hider that hide-and-seek has ever known.

18.SummaryEnglish: Craig is entrusted with a special anniversary gift for his mom and immediately loses it.

19.SummaryEnglish: Craig and his friends visit the Creek's lost & found, hoping to claim a puzzle cube.

20.SummaryEnglish: Craig helps take Raj's grandmother to the Creek.

21.SummaryEnglish: Craig joins his former enemies, the Champions of the Other Side of the Creek, on a hike to a secret waterfall.

22.SummaryEnglish: Bored on a rainy day, Craig, Kelsey, and JP put together their broken board games and find themselves transported into a gaming challenge.

23.SummaryEnglish: Craig finds himself with an unlikely house guest when Jason the Junior Forest Scout sleeps over.

24.SummaryEnglish: Craig enters a dangerous staring contest, hoping to win another one of Kenneth's Cubes.

25.SummaryEnglish: There's a thief in the Creek, and Silver Fist is the only one who can stop them.

26.SummaryEnglish: The Witches of the Creek use their mystical powers to give Craig and his friends a glimpse into the future.

27.SummaryEnglish: Craig visits his cousin, Bryson, and they go on a quest through the streets of New Jersey.

28.SummaryEnglish: Wildernessa's beloved dog goes missing, so Craig joins the search to track him down.

29.SummaryEnglish: Craig and Sparkle Cadet put together a band to sing a goodbye song to a long-lost friend.

30.SummaryEnglish: Craig goes to extreme lengths to keep up with the fall fashion trends.

31.SummaryEnglish: Craig, Cannonball, Sparkle Cadet and Diane find themselves wrapped up in a double dutch tournament.

32.SummaryEnglish: A rebellious Cow-Boy moseys into the Horse Girl Meadow, and causes a ruckus in the Creek.

33.SummaryEnglish: Craig learns new "cursed" word "clonque" after his map flies into a tree. Despite getting constant warnings about the word, he continues to say it all the time - but after a frightening dream, he begins to think he really is cursed. With nowhere to go, he gets some advice from the Witches, who inform Craig that the word was just from a annoying song that was played all the time years ago.

34.SummaryEnglish: Craig and his friends get the first-ever tour of the Slime Kids Slime Factory.

35.SummaryEnglish: Craig, Kelsey and JP find themselves stranded on an island of tattle tales.

36.SummaryEnglish: Bernard takes Craig against his will to Herkelston University.

37.SummaryEnglish: Craig tries to bring together the fastest kids in the Creek, and accidentally creates a rivalry between the 10 Speeds and the Roller Derby Kids.

38.SummaryEnglish: Craig is shocked when his older brother Bernard asks to join him at the Creek.

39.SummaryEnglish: Bernard joins up with the wrong crowd of Creek Kids, forcing Craig to take action to save his brother.

40.SummaryEnglish: Craig and his friends venture into an ancient cavern in their quest for the Heart of the Forest, and find something far more sinister.

1.SummaryEnglish: Craig and his friends seek to unmask the mysterious villain who is messing with their search for the Heart of the Forest.

2.SummaryEnglish: The former King of the Other Side of the Creek shares his story.

3.SummaryEnglish: It's Craig and his friends versus the Red Poncho in a race to gather the last pieces of the map to the Heart of the Forest.

4.SummaryEnglish: Maya makes her way back into the world of sports.

5.SummaryEnglish: The group takes a break from their search for the Heart of the Forest.

6.SummaryEnglish: Craig turns to an unlikely ally in his time of need.

7.SummaryEnglish: The journey begins to the Heart of the Forest.

8.SummaryEnglish: The epic finale of the quest for the Heart of the Forest.

1.SummaryEnglish: When a swarm of bees nest in Craig's room, he's forced to sleep somewhere else for the week while Elder Barry (now Beekeeper Barry) can remove them. Craig instead spends the night at Kelsey's house, only to discover she and her father are "morning people."

2.SummaryEnglish: Another side of JP is revealed.

3.SummaryEnglish: Craig steps inside Chateau de Toman aka the Castle of Wrassle aka Toman's House!

4.SummaryEnglish: Craig's sleepover at Wren's takes them on an adventure through multiple dimensions.

5.SummaryEnglish: A night of candy brings out Craig and Bobby's inner bad boys.

6.SummaryEnglish: Craig and friends compete in a series of cutthroat games to win Eliza's mystery prize.

7.SummaryEnglish: Jerry has stolen all the toys and taken over Elder Rock.

8.SummaryEnglish: J.P. writes down a bucket list of things he wants to do, many of which seem impossible, yet probable in their world.

9.SummaryEnglish: Kelsey is preparing for picture day, but during a decisive moment, she pulls out her favorite book The Little Warrior which tells of a young warrior who learns to be confident on her own.

10.TitleEnglish: See You Tomorrow at the Creek
10.SummaryEnglish: Craig's family take Bernard to college while he stays home.
